Name: Divine Rebirth
Story Background: When a powerful angelic force sacrificed itself to save the city, its essence lingered in the air, waiting to be reborn in a moment of dire need.
Ability: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's an Angel, create two 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying tapped and attacking.
Appearance Description: The card art depicts a radiant figure emerging from a burst of golden light, surrounded by celestial energy, with angelic beings descending from the heavens.
